definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English

sentences.english: He graduated from Xi'an international university , the Department of Foreign Languages English majors.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于西安外事学院，外语系英语专业。

sentences.english: They must have strong longings that lures them to attend MEC.
sentences.chinese: 他们一定有很强烈的渴望促使他们参加英语角。

sentences.english: Now she is a teacher of Diligent Education, teaching middle school students, mainly engaged in teaching English.
sentences.chinese: 现是用心教育中学部老师，主要从事英语的教学。

sentences.english: I can speake chinese only and I know a little simple English?
sentences.chinese: 我会说中文和一点简单的英语？

sentences.english: The controls line up so that they can be read like an English sentence.
sentences.chinese: 控件整队排列，使它们读起来像一个英语句子。

sentences.english: As a result, their spoken English might not improve.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他们的英语口语可能得不到提高。

sentences.english: I am speaking English but you are acting like sheep, only looking wide-eyed.
sentences.chinese: 我讲的是英语，但你表现的像只绵羊，只是睁大眼睛。

sentences.english: International business English teaching quality hearing can not be guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 国际商务英语听力教学质量无法保证。

sentences.english: Her job is teaching pupils English.
sentences.chinese: 她的工作是教国小生英语。

sentences.english: Good ability for listening , speaking , reading and writing english.
sentences.chinese: 良好的英语听说读写能力为佳。

sentences.english: Suzhou learn English where? World international English your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 苏州学英语哪里去？沃尔得国际英语你的最好选择。

sentences.english: Suzhou learn English where? World international English your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 苏州学英语哪里去？沃尔得国际英语你的最好选择。

sentences.english: At the activity class, I helped our teacher to make the music.
sentences.chinese: 在活动课上，我帮助我的英语老师剪辑音乐。

sentences.english: If you do, you will master the English language step by step.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，你就能一步一步地说一口流利的英语了。
